10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Wa'il narrated:"Ali said to Abu Al-Hayyaj Al-Asadi: 'I am dispatching you with what the Prophet dispatched me: "That you not leave an elevated grave without leveling it, nor an image without erasing it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَسْوِيَةِ الْقُبُورِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Leveling The Grave
